title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Pre-MOOC Integration for Advanced Mathematics Practitioner Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of calculus and linear algebra
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design MOOC-based flipped lessons applying the ADDIE model with over 80% accuracy.
Learners achieve over 90% success in math problem-solving simulations by integrating Pre-MOOC content with face-to-face instruction.
Learners analyze real-world cases using mathematical modeling in VR environments and demonstrate mastery of 4+ points (out of 5) on evaluation rubrics.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
